Body:
result = truncate_string_around(ascii_lowercase, position, 5, 5, '~~')
assert expected == result
pytest.mark.parametrize('position, expected', [(3, ('abcdefg~~', 3)), (4, (
    'abcdefgh~~', 4)), (5, ('abcdefghi~~', 5)), (6, ('~~defghij~~', 5)), (
    19, ('~~qrstuvw~~', 5)), (20, ('~~rstuvwxyz', 5)), (21, ('~~stuvwxyz', 5))]
    )
